contentrichtext.text: {{For|the mountains in Hesse|Vogelsberg Mountains}} {{Infobox German location |Name = Vogelsberg |image_photo = |Wappen = Wappen Vogelsberg (Thueringen).png |lat_deg = 51 |lat_min = 8 |lat_sec = 2 |lon_deg = 11 |lon_min = 14 |lon_sec = 37 |Lageplan = Vogelsberg in SÖM.png |Bundesland = Thüringen |Landkreis = Sömmerda |Verwaltungsgemeinschaft = An der Marke |Höhe = 155 |Fläche = 12.84 |Einwohner = 739 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 99610 |Vorwahl = 036372 |Kfz = SÖM |Gemeindeschlüssel = 16 0 68 056 |Adresse = Neue Str. 3 <br />99610 Vogelsberg |Website = [http://www.vogelsberg-thueringen.de/ www.vogelsberg-thueringen.de] |Bürgermeister = Gerhard Harsch }} '''Vogelsberg''' is a [[Municipalities in Germany|municipality]] in the [[Sömmerda (district)|Sömmerda]] [[Districts of Germany|district]] of [[Thuringia]], [[Germany]]. {{Cities and towns in Sömmerda (district)}} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Sömmerda-geo-stub}}
